collard greens


Ingredients

Cooking Instructions

Heat oil in a large pot. Saute onion and garlic until onions
are translucent. Place chopped collard greens in pot, and
add water to cover. Stir in brown sugar, molasses and liquid
smoke. Season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, reduce
heat, and simmer 30 to 40 minutes, or until greens are
tender.
Source 

https://www.allrecipes.com/recipe/40448/billys-favorite-smoky-collard-greens/ 

Reference Video 

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=Billy's Favorite Smoky Collard Greens
